name: There Is Something I Want To Do
name_original: There Is Something I Want To Do
description:
There Is Something I Want To Do

There’s something you want to do. But everytime you think about it, you can’t help but be reminded of the countless number of obstacles in your way.

‘It’s too hard for me.’

‘Nothing valuable will come from it.’

‘Others are so much better than me.’

‘It’s too difficult to make a living from this.’

...

You try anyway. After all, you really want to do it.

---

'There Is Something I Want To Do' is a casual puzzle story experience about creating shapes and growing into doing better.

Controls
The game is played using a mouse
R - Restart

FEEDBACK:

We welcome all feedback so that we can shape the game towards a more enjoyable experience. Please feel free to reach out :)

Art by Jewell Popp
